page.description: The Set Z-Order of Window action moves a window to the top or bottom of the stack of visible windows or underneath a specified window. Choose to show the current window, or another Form or Browse window.

step.description: The Set Z-Order of which window? selection will be set to "Another Form or Browse Window" if your script is not attached to a window. If it is attached to a window, your option will be "Current Window".
Select either of these two radio buttons to populate the Window name list:
Select the form or browse from the Window name list.
Select a value from the Position list. The possible values are:
If you selected "Underneath a specified window" in step 4, select a window in the Which window? list.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
